channel.title: Weird on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Weird on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: When you have no idea what to write, use randomness in your favor
item.description: I've been trying to keep up a daily pace to blogging here; that's been my habit for almost ten years. The problem is that it's not always easy to know what to write about. I've taken to using a few prompting tricks to help sort through some ideas about what to write about. The simplest one is one I haven't heard of before: use the day of the month as a key into the letters of the alphabet, and thus write about something appropriate for that day.
